General.Name: Jiangsu Nata Opto Electr Material
General.Description: Jiangsu Nata Opto-electronic Material Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells electronic materials in China, the United States, and internationally. The company offers MO source, semiconductor precursor material including ALD/CVD precursor, electronic special gas comprising hydrogen and fluorine-containing electronic special gas, and photoresist and supporting material series products. Its products are used in preparation of integrated circuits, manufacturing of LEDs, flat panel displays, third-generation semiconductors, power devices, photovoltaics and semiconductor lasers, and other fields. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
